game.name: Lethal Company
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A co-op horror about scavenging at abandoned moons to sell scrap to the Company.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A co-op horror about scavenging at abandoned moons to sell scrap to the Company.

reviewHighlights.text: Great with friends and very replayable... as long as you have friends
Very fun. Played this for the first time with some friends. At least one of us died per moon/planet. Love the proximity chat since it makes things way...
